price: 56. Zodat niemand zegt: "O, wat spijtig voor mij dat ik niet plichtsgetrouw tot Allah was en ik was zeker onder degenen die spotten.”
arabic: أَن تَقُولَ نَفۡسٞ يَٰحَسۡرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِي جَنۢبِ ٱللَّهِ وَإِن كُنتُ لَمِنَ ٱلسَّٰخِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: an taqūla nafsun yāḥasratā ʿalā mā farraṭtu fī janbi al-lahi wa-in kuntu lamina al-sākhirīna
